description.value:
Primary Energy: Space 7 (redirecting magical energy) Supporting Energy: Time 2 (duration 1 minute or until expended) Range: Self, touch Duration: 1 minute (or until 3 reflections) Total Cost: 9 Energy Action: Complex weave (2 actions) Weaving Roll: Space Potential + Space Mastery / Time Potential + Time Mastery Effect: Next 3 weaves targeting only you are reflected back at the weaver. Weaves targeting area aren't reflected. After 3 reflections or 1 minute, effect ends. Saving Throw: None (protective buff, self-only) Success Scaling: 0 = fails, 1 = 1 reflection, 2 = 3 reflections, 3 = 5 reflections (10 minutes), 4 = 8 reflections (1 hour)
